channel.title: Help wanted badly !1
channel.description:
hi i need loads of help when i compile it comes up with
the system cannot find the path specified the system cannot find the path specified press eny key to continue...
then i click edit and it says
@echo off COLOR 09 title PkZoneScape Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pause
what do i do?
help gets admin to my server
Server Includes: all working dragon wep specials (except d spears) and much more...

item.title: Help wanted badly !1
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Do you have java installed in the correct directory? Is your compiler in the same directory/pointing toward the .java files you wish to compile? Make sure your classpath system variable is correct as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Help wanted badly !1
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

it still says the system path cannont be specified

Read full topic

item.title: Help wanted badly !1
item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

Go to ultimate tut guide and look up the compiler.bat to copy and paste instead of

@echo off
COLOR 09
title PkZoneScape Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe” server[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 03:48:41 PM[/size][hr]which is

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

for the compiler.bat

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

and that for runserver.bat

Read full topic
